tool_description:
Is fully functioning API . 
this API  let you create your account todo list 
1.Create user
2.Create task 
3.Update task
4.Delete task
and more
title: Dammy-Task

api_list.name: deletetask
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dammy-task.p.rapidapi.com/tasks/618149022a9cd1155402e089"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dammy-task.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.delete(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Updatetask
api_list.description: Update your task to true if is completed or it description

api_list.name: Create task
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://dammy-task.p.rapidapi.com/tasks"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "dammy-task.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
